definition: "silk" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 120), occurring in 红, 绿, 累 etc/also pr. [mi4]
to sell/to betray/to spare no effort/to show off or flaunt
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
in turn/successively/one after the other/bit by bit

sentences.english: Positions continued price stability decreasing, and every higher up the action alone.
sentences.chinese: 價穩持倉量續遞減，多單有逢高回吐動作。

sentences.english: Use colours found in key photos or graphics on your web page for added harmony.
sentences.chinese: 用顏色或圖形找到關鍵照片你網頁續和諧。

sentences.english: Travel days may be used consecutively or non-consecutively within the validity period.
sentences.chinese: 在有效期內可乘車日可以是連續或非連續使用。

sentences.english: Travel days may be used consecutively or non-consecutively within the validity period.
sentences.chinese: 在有效期內可乘車日可以是連續或非連續使用。

sentences.english: The program must maintain a method for continually evaluating the competency of its leaders.
sentences.chinese: 課程必須爲連續評價它的領導人的能力維持一種方法。

sentences.english: Specialist continued undergraduate, but also no longer be added to this exam.
sentences.chinese: 專科續本科，也不再進行續本考試。

sentences.english: Who told you I will fall in love with someone else?
sentences.chinese: 你逃避我的問題，續說，眼淚又掉在合約上。

sentences.english: Eight materials in "Old History of the Five Dynasties" came from "XuShiShuo".
sentences.chinese: 通過《續世說》輯得《舊五代史》材料八條。

sentences.english: Travel days may be used consecutively or non-consecutively.
sentences.chinese: 在一個月內乘車日可以是連續或非連續使用。

sentences.english: Travel days may be used consecutively or non-consecutively.
sentences.chinese: 在一個月內乘車日可以是連續或非連續使用。

sentences.english: Tumbling yesterday price increments until positions, potential null layout actions.
sentences.chinese: 昨價重挫持倉量續遞增，追勢空單佈局動作大。

sentences.english: Large and sustained commitments such as that in Afghanistan would no longer be possible.
sentences.chinese: 阿富汗這種大規模的長期承諾不再可能爲續。

sentences.english: Bob picked up his latte cup and ambled off to the kitchen for a refill.
Can the English culture in NTU be regarded as a true continuation of NU?
sentences.chinese: 南洋理工大學裏的西洋文化可成爲南大的續辦嗎？

sentences.english: Whisk egg white until foamy, add sugar gradually.
sentences.chinese: 將蛋白打松，逐少加入糖份，續打至企身。

sentences.english: This price drop positions continued increasing sharply, empty single still has every high layout actions.
sentences.chinese: 今價跌持倉量續大幅遞增，空單仍有逢高佈局動作。

definition: to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
one step further/to move forward a step/further onwards
to have sth to do with/to relate to/related to/to concern/concerning
(conjunction used to express contrast with a previous clause) but/then/standard/norm/principle/to imitate/to follow/classifier for written items
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to calculate/to compute/to count/to regard as important/to plan/ruse/meter/gauge
will/shall/to use/to take/to checkmate/just a short while ago/(introduces object of main verb, used in the same way as 把[ba3])
long term/long time/long range (of a forecast)
